ARABIC: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْتَكْبَرُوٓا۟ إِنَّا بِٱلَّذِىٓ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those who were arrogant said, 'We reject Him in whom you have iman.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Those who were arrogant answered: "We do not believe in what you believe."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The haughty ones remarked. 'Most certainly we disbelieve in that which you believe.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The proud oppressors said, "We reject that which you believe in".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The proud ones said, “We deny what you have believed in.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Those who were arrogant said: "Verily, we disbelieve in that which you believe in."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Those who were haughty said: Surely we are deniers of what you believe in.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said the ones who waxed proud, 'As for us, we are unbelievers in the thing in which you believe.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Those who were scornful said: Lo! in that which ye believe we are disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The arrogant leaders said, "We reject what you believe in."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Those who were stiff-necked said: verily we are disbelievers in that which ye believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Those who were arrogant said, ‘We indeed disbelieve in what you have believed.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The Arrogant party said: "For our part, we reject what ye believe in."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Those who were arrogant said: "Verily, we disbelieve in that which you believe in."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Those who were proud said: 'We disbelieve in that which you believed in'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who were arrogant said, “We reject what you believe in.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Said those who were arrogant, "Indeed we, in that which you have believed, are disbelievers."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:76] Said the ones who were proud, ‘Truly we are disbelievers of that which you believe!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Those who were scornful) towards believing (said: Lo! in that which ye believe we are disbelievers) deniers.
